summary: Digital Transformation leader with 20+ years experience at Deloitte, SS&C, Wells Fargo, GE. Expert in AI/ML, leading 100+ team members in cognitive solutions and enterprise SaaS applications.
key_points: Vice President - AI/ML Tech CoE Head at Deloitte
20+ years experience in strategic leadership roles
Expert in Generative/Edge AI, NLP, LLMs, and data platforms
PhD candidate at IIM Ahmedabad in Leadership and Strategy
